Docs.summary: Cryptographic configuration class to access the default and overidden (machine.config) configuration settings.
Docs.remarks: The file "machine.config" can be used to change the framework default algorithm implementations or add new ones.

Docs.summary: Constructor, no idea why it is here (all class members are static).

Docs.param: Name of the cryptographic algorithm to create.
Docs.summary: Create the default cryptographic implementation for the specified algorithm name.
Docs.returns: An instance of the default implementation of the specified algorithm.
Docs.remarks: Default mapping can be modified, or added to, by modifying the machine.config file.
